snippet: A collaboration between fashion designers and the Mets produces a new line for fans.
abstract: Two fashion competitions, one a collaboration between the Council of Fashion Designers of America and the New York Mets and the other the return of the International Woolmark Prize, are inspiring New York apparel designers to expand their repertoire.
lead_paragraph: A collaboration between fashion designers and the Mets produces a new line for fans.

headline.seo: The Mets and Wool Event Inspire Designers
headline.main: The Spirit of Competition Inspires Designers
headline.print_headline: The Spirit of Competition Inspires Designers

keywords.value: Council of Fashion Designers of America
keywords.name: organizations
